title: Audien, Shallou and Rosie Darling's New Single Faces the Fear of Turning Soulmates Into Strangers
description: Audien and Shallou have created a tender yet powerful soundscape, with Darling's vocals weaving a tale of love caught in limbo.

html:
image caption

Audien, Rosie Darling, Shallou

Audien and Shallou have created a tender yet powerful soundscape, with Darling's vocals weaving a tale of love caught in limbo.

  • Author:

    Jason Heffler

  • Publish date:

    Jan 24, 2025

Armada Music/Laura-Lynn Petrick/Press

Audien and Shallou have created a tender yet powerful soundscape, with Darling's vocals weaving a tale of love caught in limbo.

  • Home
  • MUSIC RELEASES

Few tracks capture the complexity of falling in and out of love quite like "Bittersweet," the stunning new collaboration from Audien, Shallou and Rosie Darling.

Out now via Armada, the track functions as a spiritual successor to Audien's global hit "One Last Dance." Just like that aching anthem, "Bittersweet" explores the lingering emotions that make it hard to let go.

A powerful vocal performance from Darling paints an intimate scene of a pivotal moment: two people suspended between friendship and potential romance. Her work here aligns "Bittersweet" as a contemporary love song that refuses simplistic resolutions, confronting head-on the risks of turning a soulmate into a stranger.

Each line quavers with gnawing tension atop atmospheric production from Audien and Shallou. Signature elements of both producers are everywhere, like fluttering arpeggios, expansive vocal swells and chords that send chills to your toes.

Scroll to Continue
